TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_zazan, title = zazan, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/zazan} }

S.FORM: (kamu nu hulam: ) la'cus culilen ku zazan. . pazazan (kamu nu hulam: ) cima ku pazazan sananay i tisuwan? sizazan (kamu nu hulam: ) kiya sizazan inutebanan nu umah? zazanay (kamu nu hulam: ) malebek nu baliyus ku kilang nu i zazanay. . malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan zazan.
